name: ChoiceMaster
0:
”Alexa, ask Choice Master if I should call my ex.”
”Alexa, ask Choice Master if I should put on pants today.”
”Alexa, ask Choice Master if I should call in sick.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: choice master
des: If you have a difficult decision to make then let Alexa decide for you. Especially those tough question that your friends are too shy to answer for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
